content: inspired by the wonderful paintings writings and spirit of beatrix potter this shawl is a mix of delicate classic english stitches vintage style and a touch of whimsy large enough to wrap you in warmth on a cool evening light enough for spring and summer and cozy and fun enough to use as a scarf with your fall jacket or even winter coat i hope this shawl will make you smile year round and bring you joy originally designed in collaboration with tippy tree yarn for her 5th icon mystery knitalong june 2023 beatrix potter note that though the kit is no longer available tippy tree yarns is launching a potter inspired collection of colourways on july 1st 2023 which include some of the colours used for the mkal here is the link to the website https //tippytreeyarns com/collections/potter-storytime-collection yarn and notions - 4 x 50g skeins of fingering weight yarn at least 225 yards each 206 metres each referred to in the pattern simply as colours 1 through 4 - sample knit in tippy tree yarns tippy sock base using the beatrix potter shawl kit created for the mkal in june 2023 - the project may also be knit using 2 full skeins of complimentary colours using one colour for colour 1 and 3 instructions and the other for the colour 2 and 4 instructions it could also be knit in one colour using 2 skeins - total yardage 900 yards - 2 stitch markers plus a progress marker to identify the front of your work - scissors and tapestry needle for weaving in ends needles 3 75mm us size 5 circular needles 80cm or 32 cable suggested gauge blocked 20 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette and garter 24 sts unblocked
